author: jm
msg: Conf reorg continued; broke out parsing code into a separate parsing class.  also fixed some bugs that 'make test' hadn't shown up; however 'make test' is failing in t/spamd_allow_user_rules.t due to spamc coredumping when the -u switch is used ;)

author: jm
msg: bug 2987: first part of Conf reorg.  adopt new model which allows us to move conf items around.  also faster: 0m23.763s for 100 --lint runs, compared with 0m26.861s for the old style
